[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]ting nge 'dzin 'dis sgrub pa'i thabs las bshad pa'i rim pas kha zas sbyang ba dang /_lkog ma sbyang ba dang /_snying ga sbyang ba dag byas nas bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa'i zas kyi bya ba dag kyang bya'o/_/de nas le'u bcu pa las/_sngags kyi skyes bu ji snyed pa/_/rdo rje

[\[19b.1\]]sems bskyed pa dang /_bdag nyid kyi [#]lus dbul ba dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul ba dang /_mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol ba gdab pa dang /_sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes kyi [#]sdom pa bzung ba dang smon lam gdab par bya'o/_/dkon mchog
[\[19b.2\]]gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa ni slob mas tshigs su bcad pa brjod cing bya'o/_/sdom pa gzung ba ni dang po slob dpon gyis [#]bsgo ste 'di skad du/_sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/_/dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song /_/'di ni sangs rgyas rigs dag pa'i//_
[\[19b.3\]]dam tshig brtan par gyur pa'o/_/rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya dag_/blo chen khyod kyis gzung bar gyis/_/byang chub sems gang de rdo rje/_/shes rab dril bu zhes grags so/_/slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar gyis/_/bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/_/'di ni rdo rje rigs dag pa'i/_/dam tshig
[\[19b.4\]]sdom pa yin par gsungs/_/rin chen rigs mchog chen po la/_/nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du/_/zang zing mi 'jigs chos dang byams/_/sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag [#]tu sbyin/_/phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum/_/dam chos khyod kyis gzung bar gyis/_/'di ni pad+ma'i rigs dag pa'i/_/_
[\[19b.5\]]dam tshig sdom pa yin par gsungs/_/las kyi rigs mchog chen po la/_/sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/_/yang dag nyid du gzung bar bya/_/mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bya/_/srog chags rnams ni gsad [#]mi bya/_/ma byin par yang mi slang [#]ngo /_/'dod chags dag kyang mi bya zhing /_/_
[\[19b.6\]]brdzun du smra bar mi bya'o/_/nyes pa kun gyi rtsa ba ste/_/chang ni rnam par spang bar bya/_/sems can gdul phyir ma gtogs par/_/bya ba ma yin thams cad spang [#]/_/dam pa nye bar brten bya zhing /_/rnal 'byor pa kun bsnyen bkur bya/_/lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dag[# ]/ngag gi rnam
[\[19b.7\]]pa bzhi dag dang /_/yid kyi rnam pa gsum dag ni/_/ci nus par yang rjes su bsrung /_/sems can don la mi phyogs dang /_/theg pa dman la dgod mi bya/_/'khor ba dag kyang yongs mi spong [#]/_rtag tu mya ngan 'dar mi chags/_/lha dang lha min gsang ba pa/_/de la brnyas par mi
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]bya zhing /_/phyag rgya bzhon pa mtshon cha dang /_/mtshan ma 'gom par mi bya'o/_/de ltar dam tshig gsungs pa dag_/blo ldan khyod kyis rtag tu srungs[#]/_/de nas bla ma des gsungs pa'i/_/sdom pa legs par gzung bya'o/_/[#]tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang /_/dge
[\[20a.2\]]ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang /_/sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum/_/bdag gis brtan por gzung bar bgyi/_/sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/_/bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum/_/sangs rgyas rnal 'byor las skyes pa'i/_/sdom pa deng nas gzung bar bgyi/_/rdo rje rigs
[\[20a.3\]]mchog chen po yi/_/rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya dag_/yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/_/slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi/_/rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi/_/dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la/_/nyin re bzhin du dus drug tu/_/sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin/_/byang chub chen po las byung ba'i/_/_
[\[20a.4\]]pad+ma'i rigs mchog chen po la/_/phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum/_/dam chos so sor gzung bar bgyi/_/las kyi rigs mchod chen po la/_/sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/_/yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/_/mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi/_/byang chub sems ni bla med pa/_/_
[\[20a.5\]]dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/_/sems can ma lus don gyi phyir/_/bdag gis [#]sdom pa ma lus gzung /_/ma rgal [#]ba dag bsgral bar bgyi/_/ma grol ba dag bdag gis dgrol[#]/_/dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs pa byung zhing /_/mya ngan 'das la dgod par bgyi/_/lus dang ngag dang
[\[20a.6\]]yid dag gis/_/mi dge ba ni bcu po dag_/bag med pa yi [#]gnas gyur pa/_/chang ni rnam par spang bar bya/_/de bzhin lha dang lha min dang /_/gsang ba pa dag brnyas [#]pa dang /_/mtshan ma la sogs 'gom pa rnams/_/dus 'di nas ni bzung nas ni/_/ji srid byang chub snying po'i bar/_/_
[\[20a.7\]]bdag ni rab tu ldog par bgyi/_/de ltar sdom pa bzung ba'i slob ma la snying ga dang mgrin pa dang dpral bar rdo rje khu tshur gyis dri'i thig le gsum byas te/_nyi ma dang pad+ma dang zla ba la yi ge gsum so sor bkod la sku dang gsung dang thugs su byin gyis brlab cing /_las thams cad pa'i sngags
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]kyis bsrung bar bya'o/_/de nas mchod pa byas te spyi bor me tog dang spos so[#]/_/mar me dang dri ni snying gar ro/_/lha bshos ni mdun du'o/_/de re re la yang tshig 'di sngon du 'gro bas sbyin te/_dus 'di nyid nas bzung nas ni/_/'khor ba'i skyon gyis ma gos par/_/mchod pa kun dang
[\[20b.2\]]ldan pa ni/_/dus kun du ni bde bar mnos/_/zhes pas so/_/de nas las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis mngon par bsngags [#]pa'i so shing sor bcu gnyis pa shing drang po 'o ma can las byung ba srin bus ma zos pa/_bu ga dang mdzes pa med pa drang pos byas pa la dri zhim pos byugs
[\[20b.3\]]shing rtse mo me tog gi phreng bas brgyan pa [#]slob ma shar phyogs su kha bltas te mi smra bar so shing bca'o/_/bza' ba zin nas mdun drang por dor ro/_/de nas so shing gi rtse mo'i ltas blta [#]ste/_phyogs mtshams kyi dbye bas zhi ba la sogs pa'i las [#]brgyad 'grub pa'am/_yang na
[\[20b.4\]]bdag la lta ba'am rtse mo gyen du 'greng na dngos grub mchog 'grub po/_/de bzhin du shar du bltas na dngos grub 'bring 'grub bo/_/mtshams dang byang du bltas na 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub 'grub po/_/thur du bltas nas 'og gi [#]dngos grub 'grub bo/_/de nas ngag gi nyes pa sbyang
[\[20b.5\]]ba'i [#]phyir 'thor 'thung [#]byas te kha bkrus nas hub gsum 'thung du gzhug pa'i sngags ni/_oM hrIH [#]bi shud+d+hA ya sar+b+ba [#]d+harmAya sar+b+ba [#]pA paM ni tsa saM [(]shod+hA [,]shod+d+hA [)]ya[#]/_sar+b+ba bi kalpa [#]a ba na ya hUM/_zhes bzlas la chu khyor ba gsum 'thung du gzhug [#]go/_/'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen rnams/_/u dum+bA [#]ra'i me
[\[20b.6\]]tog bzhin/_/brgya lam na [#]ni res 'ga' zhig[# ]/'byung 'gyur yang na mi 'byung ngo /_/gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul 'byung ba/_/de bas kyang ni dkon pa ste/_/gang gis mnyam med sems can don/_/mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus/_/bskal pa bye ma [#]du ma ru/_/sdig pa byas par gyur
[\[20b.7\]]pa gang /_/de kun dkyil 'khor 'di 'dra ba/_/mthong bas 'byang bar 'gyur yin na[#]/_/grags pa mtha' yas sngags spyod pa'i/_/tshul la gnas pa smos ci dgos/_/skyob pa'i gsang sngags bzlas na [#]ni/_/go 'phang [#]bla na med par 'gyur/_/gang dag spyod pa mchog 'di la/_/blo gros
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]shin tu mi g.yo ba/_/de dag gis [#]ni ngan 'gro'i rgyun/_/sdug bsngal kun 'byung rab tu bcad/_/bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams kyis/_/rnyed pa mnyam med de ring rnyed/_/gang phyir rgyal ba sras bcas la/_/bdag nyid chen po kun gyis ni/_/bstan pa 'di la
[\[21a.2\]]khyed rnams kun/_/yongs su bzung ste skye bzhin pa/_/de phyir khyed rnams theg chen la/_/sang ni rab tu skye bar 'gyur/_/theg pa chen po cher 'byung ba'i/_/lam [#]mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan/_/khyed rnams der ni dong bas na/_/rang 'byung skal ba chen po la/_/'jig rten
[\[21a.3\]]thams cad mkhyen pa yi/_/de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ba yin/_/yod dang med las rnam par 'das/_/nam mkha' bzhin du dri ma med/_/zab mo rtog ge thams cad kyis/_/rab tu mi rtogs gnas med pa/_/spros pa kun dang bral ba ste/_/spros pa rnams kyis ma spros pa/_/las
[\[21a.4\]]dang bya ba la sogs bral/_/bden pa gnyis la gnas pa yi/_/theg pa rab kyi mchog 'di yi/_/tshul la gnas na thob par 'gyur/_/[#]zhes bya ba'i tshig 'di dag ni theg pa chen po'i chos bshad pas spro ba yang dag par bskyed [#]par bya'o/_/de nas las thams cad pa bzlas pa'i srung skud
[\[21a.5\]]mdud pa gsum bor ba dpung ba g.yon pa la gdags so/_/de nas sngags kyis btab pa'i ku sha la sngas dang stan byas te/_rmi lam gyi ltas blta'o [#]/_/rmi lam gyi ltas [#]mthong ba dge ba'am mi dge ba nang par dus su nga la zlos [#]shig ces bsgo'o/_/rmi lam mi dge ba na las thams cad pa'i sngags
[\[21a.6\]]kyis gzhom mo/_/de nas mchod pa dang bstod pa byas te/_nam mkha'i phyogs su dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bkod la dra ba dang ra bas kha sbyar gyi sbyor bas bsrung te gzhag [#]go/_/de dag ni [(]lta [,]sta [)]gon la gnas pa'i cho ga'o//_//de nas slob dpon rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pas rang
[\[21a.7\]]bzhin gyis dkyil 'khor bskul ba'i phyir nam mkha' la gdab pa'i skud [#]pa dang tshon gyis dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir sa la gdab pa dang gnyis bya ste/_de la thog mar rang gi phyag rgya ma bslabs pa [#]'byongs pa dang thig skud bkal te/_de nas tshon lnga so sor btsos nas bdud rtsi lnga dang dri zhim pos
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]byugs shing gser la sogs pa'i snod gtsang mar bzhag la/_rigs re re la yang rang rang [#]gtso bor byas pa'i lnga lnga yod pas skud pa re re la yang lnga lnga ste nyi shu rtsa lnga bya'o/_/sngags pas bdag nyid kyi mig g.yas g.yon la dza dkar dmar las bskyed pa'i nyi zla bskyed la/_
[\[21b.2\]]de nyid la yang rdzas so sor mtshon pa mig gi [#]gzim ma 'dren par byed pa'i 'bar ba'i lta bas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du bltas [#]te/_dza [#]las 'phros pa'i 'od zer gyi lcags kyus ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka nas ye shes kyi skud pa drangs te/_yi ge lngas drang pa'i dam tshig gis [# ]
[\[21b.3\]]skud pa la thim par byas nas/_las thams cad pa'i dri'i chus bsang gtor byas pa'i dri dang me tog la sogs pa phul nas/_oM AHoM hUM[#]/_oM AHswA hUM[#]/_oM AHAH[#]hUM/_oM AH[#]hU hUM/_oM AH[#]hUM hUM/_zhes bzlas so/_/'khal zhing sgril ba'i dus su yang /_oM a n+yo n+yA nu ga ta
[\[21b.4\]]sar+b+ba d+har+m+mA pa ra spa ra a nu ga ta sar+b+ba d+har+m+mAH ad+yan+tA nu ga ta sar+b+ba d+har+m+mA nu pra be sha ya sar+b+ba d+har+m+mA [#]hUM/_zhes rjes su dran pas bzlas shing bsgril lo/_/de nas tshon sna gcig pa'i las thams cad pa'i skud pa byas te dri zhim po dang bdud rtsi lnga dang las thams cad pa bzlas pa'i yungs kar bsres pa sbangs
[\[21b.5\]]te/_tsan+dan dkar po'i chus byug par bya'o/_/skud pa yi ge gsum gyi nang du chud par bya'o/_/skud pa bsngogs shing bzung nas dz+dza gsum gyis bton la rang rang gi phyag rgya ma la gtad par bya'o/_/shes rab med par bdag nyid gcig pu spyod na slob dpon rdo rje sems dpa'i [#]ting nge 'dzin la gnas la
[\[21b.6\]]slob ma rnam par snang mdzad dam bdud rtsi thab sbyor du bsams te shar gyi sgor gnas par bya'o/_/nub dang shar na gnas pa'i slob dpon slob mas khu tshur g.yon gyis [#]bzung nas/_oM badzra sa mA [#]ya sU tra ma [#]ti kra ma hUM/_zhes brjod pas/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gnas pa'i de
[\[21b.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'gro ba sems can gyi don gyi phyir gshegs shig par thig gi sgras bskul bar bsam par bya'o/_/de nas slob dpon gnod sbyin gyi phyogs su kha bltas la slob ma gshin rje'i phyogs su kha bltas te nam mkha' la thig gdab par bya'o/_/de bzhin du klu dang
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]brgya byin gyi phyogs su kha bltas la thig gnyis pa gdab par bya'o/_/de bzhin du grwa dang phyogs la sogs pa gdab par bya'o/_/de la dang po ni tshangs pa'i thig go/_/gnyis pa ni grwa'i thig go/_/gsum pa ni phyi rol gyi thig go/_/bzhi pa ni so sor cha rnam par dbye ba'i
[\[22a.2\]]thig go/_/de nas nam mkha' la btab pa bzhin du sa la gdab par bya ste/_tshangs thig gi g.yas g.yon du ri mo dgu dgu btab pas cha bcu bcur 'gyur te/_spyir cha chen po nyi shur 'gyur ro/_/de re re'i nang du thig gsum gsum btab pas snam bu bzhi bzhir 'gyur te/_des [#]cha phran brgyad [# ]
[\[22a.3\]]cur 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du tshangs thig gnyis pa'i g.yas g.yon yang gdab par shes par bya'o/_/[#]de la lnga pa'i dang pos ning ba'i tshon sna lnga'i sa bya'o/_/lnga pa bzhi pas ni 'gram gyi tshon sna lnga'i sa bya'o/_/drug pa'i gsum pas ni sgo'i steng logs kyi tshon sna lnga'i sa bya'o/_/dang po'i
[\[22a.4\]]gsum pas ni sgo khyud kyi tshon sna lnga'i sa bya'o/_/gnyis pa'i gnyis pas ni logs kyi tshon sna lnga'i sa bya'o/_/dang po'i bzhi pa dang gnyis pa'i dang pos ni khyams kyi sa bya'o/_/lnga pa'i gnyis pa dang gsum pas ni [#]kha khyer gyi sa bya'o/_/lnga pa'i bzhi pas kha khyer gyi sa bya'o/_/drug pa'i dang
[\[22a.5\]]po dang gnyis pas dra ba dang dra phyed kyis bya'o/_/des ni dkyil 'khor gyi gnas bsgrub pa'o/_/dang po'i bzhi pas ni nang [#]gi ka ba'i sa bya'o/_/gnyis pa'i gsum pas ni phyi'i ka ba'i sa bya'o/_/de nas tsan+dan gyi phur bu la/_oM badzra kI [#]li kI la ya sarba big+hAM [#]baM hUM/_zhes lan bdun bzlas pas
[\[22a.6\]]dbus kyi lte ba la btab la gsum pa'i gsum pa la rdo rje ra ba'i sar [#]ri mo gnyis su g.yas skor du zlum por bskor bar bya'o/_/de nas dgu pa'i dang po dang gnyis pa dang gsum pa gsum ri mo gnyis kyis bskor ba khor yug te [#]pad+ma'i phreng pa'i sa bya'o/_/de'i 'og gi cha gsum la nang gi phyed dang
[\[22a.7\]]gnyis kyis ni khor yug chen po ste phyi rol gyi rdo rje ra ba'i sa bskor bar bya'o/_/de dag kyang dang po ri mo nang nas bskor ro/_/de nas phyi rol nas bskor te/_de'i lhag ma phyed dang gnyis kyis ni 'od kyi dkyil 'khor ro/_/tha ma'i cha bran stong pa gnyis kyis ni dkyil 'khor gyi nye 'khor gyi [#]sa bya'o/_/_
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]de nas gsum pa'i bzhi pa la 'dod pa'i lha mo'i snam bu'o/_/bzhi pa'i dang po dang bzhi pa'i gnyis pa dang bzhi pa'i gsum pa dang bzhi pa'i bzhi pa rnams gcig tu byas pa ni sgo dang 'brel pa'i phyi'i snam bu'o/_/de nas mig gnyis la d+hi [#]las nyi zla bskyed pa'i khro bo'i lta bas nang gi
[\[22b.2\]]thig gdab [#]nas khro bo'i mig gi lta stangs [#]kyi 'od zer gyis [#]bgegs bsal la phyi'i thig gdab par bya ste/_sngar btab pa rnams la [#]ci rigs par sbyar bar bya'o/_/de la ra ba'i tshon sna lnga dang 'gram gyi tshon sna lnga [#]sgo dang 'brel pa phyi'i [#]sgo'i nang dang sgo khyud kyis bya'o/_/rta babs bzhi ni
[\[22b.3\]]chur sgo'i bzhi 'gyur snam phran bcu drug gi tshad do/_/de la chu srin gyi mgo la sogs pa'i rgyan [#]rnams dgod pa'i sa bya'o/_/ra ba dang 'brel pa'i snam phran dang po dang gnyis pa la gar mkhan gyi lha mo mchod pas phyag brel [#]pa rnams so/_/gsum pa la ni rin chen pha gu'i sa'o/_/bzhi pa
[\[22b.4\]]dang lnga ba la ni dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa dang nyi zla'o/_/drug pa la rdo rje nor bu phyed pa'o/_/sgo'i logs dang 'gram rnams su rnga yab 'bar ba dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan rlung gis bskyod pa'o/_/chos kyi 'khor lo'i g.yas g.yon du ri dgas kyis [#]mtshan pa/_phyi rol gyi grwa bzhir gser gyi
[\[22b.5\]]bum pa brgyad dang mchod pa la sogs pa ci rigs par bri bar bya'o/_/de yang /_thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ni/_/gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/_/rta babs bzhi yis rnams par brgyan/_/thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/_/ka pa brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes/_/dra ba dra phyed rdo rje dang /_/_
[\[22b.6\]]nor bu zla bas brgyan pa'o/_/sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams rnams su/_/rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras/_/bum pa ka ba rdo rje phyed/_/bre yi phreng ni rim bzhin gnas/_/ba dan dril bus mdzes byas la/_/rnga yab rnams kyis rnam par brgyan/_/'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ni/_/mchod
[\[22b.7\]]pa rnam pa lnga yis brgyan/_/khru ni bcu gnyis tshad dang ldan/_/tshon rtsi lnga dang yang dag ldan/_/bum pa brgyad dang ldan pa bri/_/kun nas yongs su zlum por bya/_/de dag [#]ni thig gi cho ga'o//_//de nas rdul tshon byin gyis brlab par bya ste/_kha dog lnga la hUM la sogs pa kha dog lnga dang
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]ldan pa so sor bstims la/_ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor bsdu ba la sogs pa thig gi cho ga bzhin bya ste/_tshon rtsi 'od 'bar bar bsams te/_oM badzra tsi tra sa ma ya ma [#]ti kra ma hUM/_zhes brjod pas byin gyis brlabs te/_chos dbyings 'di ni rnam par dag_/_
[\[23a.2\]]sems can khams ni rnam grol [#]mdzad/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa rgyal po che/_/rdul tshon mi phyed ngo bo nyid/_/ces pa'o/_/de nas slob mas g.yon pa'i khu tshur gyis dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams te sgo'i steng logs kyi tshad du bri bar bya'o/_/de yang phyi rol nas brtsams te thog mar ni
[\[23a.3\]]dkar po'o/_/de nas ni ser po'o/_/de nas ni dmar po'o/_/de nas ni [#]ljang gu ste nang rol ni nag po'o/_/de yang sbom phra dang yon po dang g.yon skor la sogs pa'i skyon spangs te bri'o/_/de nas dbus nas bri'o/_/de nas las kyi rdo rje la sogs pas ci bder bri'o/_/dbus dang shar la sogs
[\[23a.4\]]pa'i re'u cha rnams ni nag po dang /_dkar po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_ljang gu go rims bzhin no/_/mchod snam ni dmar po'o/_/[#]sgo dang sgo'i snam bu ni phyogs kyi snam bu'o/_/de nas rdul tshon gyi bgegs 'byung ba lnga las byung ba rnams ni sku'i dkyil 'khor la ni gshin rje gshed kyi
[\[23a.5\]]sbyor bas gzhom mo/_/gsung gi dkyil 'khor la ni rta mgrin gyi sbyor bas so/_/bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi [#]sbyor bas sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gang la yang sbyar du rung ngo /_/'dir ni rdo rje 'chang gi dkyil 'khor yin pas na gnod mdzes kyi sbyor bas bgegs gzhom par bya ste/_oM sum+b+ha ni
[\[23a.6\]]sum+b+ha hUM phaT/_oM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na [#]hUM phaT/_oM gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA [#]pa ya hUM phaT/_oM A na ya ho b+ha ga bA na bid+yA rA [#]dza hUM phaT/_ces brjod cing gnod mdzes kyi tsham ngam gyis [#]srung zhing rnam par 'phru pas bgegs kyi tshogs 'jig par byed pa 'di la som nyi mi bya'o/_/de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas
[\[23a.7\]]de nas [#]phyag rgya dgod par bya ste/_hUM la sogs pa gsung gi phyag rgya'am/_rdo rje la sogs pa thugs kyi phyag rgya'am/_phyag dang zhabs la sogs pa sku'i [#]phyag rgya bri bar bya ste/_de la 'dir re zhig thugs kyi mtshan ma'i dbang du byas nas bshad pa gsungs te/_dbus su ni sna tshogs pad+ma dang
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]nyi ma'i steng du kha dog sngon po'i rdo rje chen po rtse dgu pa'o/_/shar la sogs pa'i phyogs bzhir sna tshogs pad+ma la gnas pa'i zla ba dang rin po che dang /_pad+ma dang rgya gram gyi gdan gyi steng du 'khor lo dang /_rin po che dang /_pad+ma dang /_ral gri kha dog so sor bri bar bya'o/_/me'i gra la sogs pa'i

[\[45a.2\]]bzhin [#]rig pa de la brtse ba'i thabs kyis/_kye ma kyi hud sems can 'di dag ni [#]sdug bsngal ba/_'di dag ni rang gi sems kyi chos nyid kyi rang bzhin ma gtogs [#]pa yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rnam par rtog pa phyin ci log gi gdon gyis bzung ba/_'khor ba na sdug bsngal sna tshogs nyams
[\[45a.3\]]su myong ba yin zhing /_ji ltar de dag rang gi sems kyi chos nyid kyi rang bzhin rtogs par 'gyur ba de bzhin du bdag gis 'bad par bya'o zhes sems can la dmigs pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gang snying rje chen pos yongs su bzung ba'i sems bskyed pa de ni byang chub kyi sems dang /_
[\[45a.4\]]sems can thams cad la phan pa'i sems dang /_sems can thams cad la bde ba'i sems dang /_bla na med pa'i sems dang /_chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa'i sems dang /_sems can thams cad la brten nas skyes pa'i byang chub kyi sems zhes bya'o/_/byang chub sems kyi 'grel
[\[45a.5\]]pa slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//kha che'i paN+Di ta dza [#]ya a nan+ta dang /_bod kyi lo tsA ba khu mdo sde 'bar gyis bsgyur ba'o//[ {D1802}# ]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_pany+tsa kra ma/_bod skad du/_rim pa lnga pa/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mgon
[\[45a.6\]]po sangs rgyas kun bdag nyid/_/dpal ldan bde chen la btud de/_/rnal 'byor rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs nas/_/rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim bshad bya/_/bskyed pa'i rim la legs gnas shing /_/rdzogs pa'i rim pa 'dod rnams la/_/thabs 'di rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_/_

[\[49b.1\]]bar 'di las mtshon par 'gyur/_/'dod chags nyid dang chags bral dang /_/de yi bar de gsum po ni/_/dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor ba'i/_/rdo rje pad+ma 'dus las so/_/ye shes gnyis ni mnyam sbyor las/_/snyoms par 'jug par bshad pa yin/_/ye shes gnyis
[\[49b.2\]]kyi mnyam sbyor dang /_/ji skad bshad pa'i bya ba yis/_/'bad pas ye shes gang thob pa/_/de ni snang ba thob pa'o/_/gang zhig chu skyes rdo rje sbyor/_/kun rdzob tu yang med gyur na/_/lan cig tsam zhig myong nas kyang /_/rnal 'byor stobs kyis 'grub par 'gyur/_/ye shes
[\[49b.3\]]'jug pa'i ngo bo yi[#]/_/dbye ba ji bzhin shes byas la/_/rang bzhin de nyid slar yang ni/_/rtag tu rnal 'byor pas mtshon bya/_/ji ltar sprin ni sna tshogs shing /_/mdog dang dbyibs ni tha dad pa/_/nam mkha'i dbyings su byung nas ni/_/de nyid du ni thim par 'gyur/_/de bzhin rang

[\[52a.1\]]po byas la lo bcu drug ma rdo rje slob dpon chen po la phul te/_de'i 'og tu bla ma'i zhal snga nas bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'i man ngag thob nas/_de'i 'og tu phreng ba dang chu dang rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang rdo rje dang dril bu sbyin pa [#]me long dang ming dang slob dpon

[\[53b.1\]]'gyur ba dang /_/'gro la rab mchog ston par 'gyur/_/lha dang bcas pa kun gyis mchod/_/yang dang yang du phyag byed 'gyur/_/ji ltar ston pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/'jig rten phan par bzhed pas gshegs/_/de bzhin rnal 'byor chen po ni/_/sna tshogs ye shes rjes su sdud/_/_

[\[54a.1\]]che ba'i lha/_/man ngag rnams ni rab ster bas/_/rdo rje slob dpon de bas lhag_/de ni yang dag mnyes byas te/_/lo 'am yang na zla ba la/_/bla ma de ni mnyes byas la/_/ci nus pas ni mchod par bya/_/ci 'byor pa yi phyag rgya ni/_/legs par bslabs

[\[54a.4\]]nam mkha' dang ni mnyam gyur la/_/'dod pa rnams kyis ma gos pa/_/dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/phung po rnams dang khams rnams dang /_/skye mched rnams la mi brten cing /_/phyin ci log las rnam grol ba/_/dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rnam rtog
[\[54a.5\]]med cing kun rtog med/_/thugs ni rab tu mi gnas pa/_/bsam gyis mi khyab pa yi thugs/_/dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/ji ltar nam mkha' gnas med cing /_/spros med gos pa med pa ltar/_/mkha' dang mnyam pa'i thugs mnga' ba/_/dmigs med khyod la

[\[62b.5\]]dang snying ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi'o/_/so dang pags pa dang sha dang snying ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o/_/rgyus pa dang sha dang rtsib ma dang snying ni don yod grub pa'o/_/dri ma dang rgyu ma dang mkhris pa dang snying ni mi bskyod pa ste ji skad du rdo rje phreng ba las kyang /_snying ni lnga la nges gnas te/_/rgyud lngar

[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]bshad do/_/mA ma kI'i [#]ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang du byas te [#]bshad pa/_de la chu'i khams kyi tshogs ni mA ma kI'o/_/de yang de bzhin gshegs pa lngas byin gyis brlabs pa ste/_bad kan dang mchi ma ni rnam par snang mdzad kyis byin gyis brlab [#]pa'o/_/gcin [#]ni mi

[\[63b.1\]]gnas pa ni don yod grub pa'i'o/_/khyab byed ces bya ba tshigs thams cad la gnas pa ni rnam par snang mdzad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o/_/yang de rnams re re'i las bshad pa/_dbang po'i sgo yi rgyun las ni/_/srog dang rtsol ba rgyu ba dang /_/rtag pa'i dus su rgyu ba ni/_/srog

[\[66a.1\]]ba ste[#]/_de bas na gang [#]gzugs kyi phung po la sogs pa 'byung ba las gyur pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs can te/_de ni sa'i khams sdud par byed pas nye bar 'gro'o/_/de bzhin du rin po che'i rigs can rnams ni chu'i khams so/_/pad+ma'i rigs

[\[80b.2\]]po sna tshogs la mngon par zhen pa spangs nas bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i sgo la mngon par phyogs par 'gyur te/_rtsa ba'i rgyud las rigs kyi bu mnyam par gzhag pas rang gi sems la so sor rtogs shig ces gsungs pas so/_/de ltar bshad pa'i rgyud la brten nas rang gi rang bzhin snang ba'i
[\[80b.3\]]rjes su 'brangs nas [#]rang gi sems yang dag pa ji lta ba [#]bzhin du ma rtogs par las su smra ba'i sems can rnams/_'khor ba thog ma med pa nas rang gi sems rnam par rtog pa las byung ba'i las dang nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bas dar gyi srin bu bzhin du rang nyid kyis sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po
[\[80b.4\]]mngon par 'dus byas nas skye ba gcig nas gcig tu nye bar bsags pa'i dge ba dang /_mi dge ba'i las rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa myong nas yang don dam pa'i bden pa'i dkyil 'khor la 'jug pa'i rim gyis phung po yongs su spangs te/_rlung gi khams kyis blangs nas tshor ba dang
[\[80b.5\]]ldan zhing sred pas rjes su bcings la/_chos kyi dbyings kyi rgyu mthun pa las byung ba'i dran pas yongs su bzung ba/_dge ba dang mi dge ba'i rnam pa'i yid dang ldan pa/_byis pa lo lnga pa dang mnyam pa thams cad mthong ba/_dbang po thams cad tshang ba/_dri'i zas la spyod pa/_rdo rje la
[\[80b.6\]]sogs pas kyang mi bzlogs la [#]mtshan nyid thams cad dang ldan pa/_las kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi shugs dang ldan pa/_nyi ma bdun [#]gyis 'ong ba'i bar la gnas nas rang gi rnam par rtog pa las byung ba'i las [#]dge ba dang mi dge bas bskal par [#]gyur pas rgyu dang rkyen thob nas 'gro ba lnga rnams su/_zo chun
[\[80b.7\]]gyi 'khrul 'khor gyi tshul gyis yang dang yang du nying mtshams sbyor ba len par byed cing /_'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rjes su myong bar 'gyur ro/_/sems rnam par dben pa bsdus pa'i the tshom gcod pa zhes bya ba ste le'u bzhi pa'o//_//rdo rje slob mas gsol pa/_bcom ldan

[\[81a.1\]]'das rnam par shes pa sna tshogs pa gzhan dag kyang zhu bar 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te rnam par shes pa gsum gyi [#]snang ba ni gzugs med pa yin la rlung gi khams kyang gzugs med pa yin zhing las kyang gzugs med pa ste/_de

[\[81a.3\]]bzhin brgya drug cu po 'di rnams kyi [#]dge ba dang mi dge ba rnams nye bar bsags nas de 'di nyid skad cig thang cig tu skye zhing rab tu 'jig par 'gyur na des ji ltar na yang nas yang du 'jig rten pha rol tu nye bar dmigs par 'gyur/_yang na dge ba dang mi dge ba de [#]dag gzhan dag las
[\[81a.4\]]mchi bar 'gyur/_yang na rang gi sems kyi bag chags las 'byung bar 'gyur ba lags/_bdag gi 'gyod pa 'di dag bcom ldan 'das rdo rje slob dpon ston pas rnam par bsal du gsol/_rdo rje slob dpon gyis smras pa/_sems can chen po legs so legs so/_/_

[\[81b.1\]]spyod pa ni rnam pa bzhi'o/_/yid kyi nyes par spyod pa ni rnam pa gsum ste/_de dag gis sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa/_lus kyi nyes par spyod pa dang ngag gi nyes par spyod pa'i rab tu dbye ba dang /_yid kyi [#]nyes par spyod pa du
[\[81b.2\]]zhig mchis pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/_bde bar gshegs pa bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gsang ba'i bdag po nyes par spyod pa de nyid ni lci bar gyur pa dang /_tha mal pa rnams te/_de la pha dang ma dang /_bla mar gyur

[\[82a.1\]]bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la ma chags pa de nyid ni sems kyi nyes par spyod pa'o/_/rgyags pa dang /_dregs pa dang /_nga rgyal dang /_khro ba dang /_sems can rnam par 'jig pa dang /_'dod chags kyi sems kyis gzhan gyi bud med la chags pa

[\[82a.4\]]sems yin no zhes bdag tu rlom pa dang /_ngar sems pas las [#]dge ba dang mi dge ba rnams byas nas bde 'gro dang ngan 'gror mchog tu gzhol bar 'gyur ro/_/rang bzhin snang ba'i rim gyis sems rnam par dben pa rtogs pa'i ye shes can ni lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid

[\[82b.1\]]byas nas ni/_/dmyal [#]la sogs par 'tshed [#]par 'gyur/_/sbyin sogs dge ba byas nas ni/_/mtho ris la sogs dag tu mchod/_/skye ba dpag med stong phrag ni/_/'di [#]ni yang dang yang thob pa/_/'di ni sngon las rnam smin zhes/_/rmongs pa rnams ni mya ngan byed/_/rang bzhin snang

[\[82b.3\]]ni 'dus ma byas pa gzugs can ma yin pa las ji lta ba bzhin gyi dbye bas rlung yang thogs pa med pa ste/_'jig rten thams cad kyi sems kyi rang bzhin shes pa de ni rnam par dag pa yin pas na nyon mongs par 'byung bar [#]'gyur ba mi srid do zhes gsungs pas so/_/yang rigs pa 'dis

[\[82b.5\]]kyang ci dgos zhes gsungs pa dang /_gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi rgyud chen po las kyang /_dge ba bcu yi las kyi lam/_/byed pa ye shes spangs pa'o/_/zhes gsungs pa'o/_/de ltar na sems can dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral bas rang gi sems ji lta ba nyid
[\[82b.6\]]yongs su shes pa ma rtogs pas [#]ngar 'dzin pa dang /_nga yir 'dzin pa dang /_gso ba dang /_gsog la brtags nas dge ba dang mi dge ba la sogs par brtags pas 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas sdug bsngal nyams su myong ba yin no/_/ji skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis shes rab kyi pha

[\[83a.1\]]byang bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das dben pa ni kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur/_rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das stong pa ni kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur[#]/_rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das

[\[83b.4\]]pa'i chos rnams la brtags[#]/_phyin ci log la brtags[#]/_gsob dang /_gsog lta bu'i chos thams cad la brtags [#]pas/_sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong ci de ltar [#]sems kun nas nyon mongs pas sems can rnams kun
[\[83b.5\]]nas nyon mongs pa can du 'gyur ram/_sems rnam par dag pas sems can rnam par [#]'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod kyi mdo las kyang /_chos thams cad la dad pa med pas mngon par dad cing lhag par mos na des [#]ni sems can de ngan 'gror 'gro bar [#]mi smra'o/_/_
[\[83b.6\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nyon mongs pa rnams la phung po med pa'i phyir ro/_/nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par dben pa las rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa dang phrad pa las skye bar 'gyur la/_skyes pa tsam gyis 'gag par 'gyur te/_gang skye ba dang 'jig pa de ni nyon mongs pa rnams kyis [#]'jig pa'o

[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]bzhin 'dod chags sogs dri ma/_/brtags pas gzhan gyi dbang gyur pas/_/byis pa sdug bsngal gyis nyon mongs/_/'di dag thams cad sems tsam ste/_/sgyu ma'i rnam par yang dag 'byung /_/de nas dge dang mi dge'i las/_/des ni bde 'gro ngan 'gror
[\[84a.2\]]skye/_/zhes gsungs pas so/_/de ltar na rigs pa 'dis lung dang rigs pa dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa snying rje chen po'i bdag nyid can thams cad kyis sems can thams cad sdug bsngal gyi dba' klong du lhung bar gyur cing skyabs med pa dpung gnyen med pa rnams la gzigs
[\[84a.3\]]nas kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i tshul gyis nyon mongs pa'i ngo bo nyid yongs su shes pas nyon mongs pa rnam par dag par mdzad cing /_kun rdzob kyi bden pa yang don dam pa'i bden pas rnam par sbyangs nas yang dag pa'i tshul gyi bdag nyid can gyi ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par 'jog par mdzad pa
[\[84a.4\]]yin no/_/las kyi mtha' rnam par 'byed pa'i bsdus pa'i the tshom gcod pa ste le'u lnga pa'o//_//rdo rje slob mas gsol pa/_khyed kyi zhal snga nas kyi bka' drin gyis [#]bshad ma thag pa'i gsung rab kyi rjes su 'brangs nas lus dang ngag dang sems kyi mtshan nyid la so sor brtags
[\[84a.5\]]pas nges par 'tshal te/_ting nge 'dzin gzhan gyi khyad par yang rje btsun gyi zhal snga nas gsol nas gong nas gong du ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par zhu bar 'tshal lo/_/bskyed pa'i rim pa nas brtsams te lus rnam par dben pa'i mthar thug pa'i bar du rdo rje gsum la sogs pas kyang mtshan
[\[84a.6\]]nyid la lhag par mos pa tsam lags te/_de bas na lus rnam par dben pa la yang lha'i gzugs med de/_lus ni rdul phra rab bsags pa tsam yin pa'i phyir ro/_/ngag rnam par dben pa'i mthar thug pa yang 'jug pa la sogs pa'i rim gyis rdo rje bzlas pa tsam yongs su shes
[\[84a.7\]]pa ste/_de la yang lha'i rnam pa med de sgra rnams ni brag ca lta bu yin pa'i phyir ro/_/sems rnam par dben pa'i mthar thug pa yang rang bzhin gyis snang ba tsam yongs su shes pa tsam du zad pas der yang rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i lha'i sku'i ngo bor rnyed par mi 'gyur te/_
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]sems ni snang ba tsam yin pa'i phyir ro/_/[#]rigs pa 'dis ni [#]kun rdzob la brten nas gnas pa rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/_/de bas na ye shes tsam gyis lha nyid du bskyed pa slob dpon gyi zhal snga las rtogs [#]par bgyid 'tshal lo/_/rdo rje slob dpon gyis smras pa/_sems can chen po legs
[\[84b.2\]]so legs so/_/lha'i de kho na nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bshad pa [#]bla ma brgyud pa'i rim pa las 'ongs pa/_sa bcu'i dbang phyug rnams kyi yang yul ma yin pa de ngas khong du chud par bya'o/_/rang gi sems yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes
[\[84b.3\]]pa [#]zhes bya ba phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams la yang med pa/_ye shes tsam du yongs su snang ba tsam gyis mtshan thams cad dang ldan pa'i lha'i skur gzung ba de yang sgyu ma dang /_rmi lam la sogs pa'i dpe rnam pa bcu gnyis kyis nye bar mtshon pa 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi
[\[84b.4\]]yid kyi rang bzhin gyi sku yin no/_/rdo rje slob mas gsol pa/_brten pa'i lus med par sems kyi rang bzhin yang med pa[#]/_sems med par yang lus dmigs su med do zhes lung gi tshig las gsungs na/_de ji ltar na sems 'ba' zhig tsam gyis phyag dang zhabs la sogs
[\[84b.5\]]pa mtshan thams cad dang ldan pa'i lha'i sku rdzogs par 'gyur/_dmigs pa'i lta ba can rnams ni lung dang rtogs pa med par yid ches par mi 'gyur ro/_/de bas na de rnams dmigs su med pa'i lha'i de kho na nyid bde blag tu mngon du bya ba'i thabs bcom ldan 'das rdo rje slob dpon
[\[84b.6\]]ston pas bshad du gsol/_rdo rje slob dpon gyis smras pa/_sems can chen po legs so legs so/_/gang mdo sde la sogs pa'i tshul la zhugs pa dang /_bskyed pa'i rim pa la gnas pa'i sgom pa po rnams kyang chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu dang /_rmi lam lta bu dang /_gzugs brnyan
[\[84b.7\]]lta bu zhes dper brjod cing lhag par mos kyang de rnams dpes bdag la byin gyis brlab [#]pa'i man ngag [#]shes tsam gyis yid kyi [#]rang bzhin gyi lha'i sku rdzogs par 'gyur ba shes par ni mi 'gyur ro/_/de bas na ngas rnal 'byor gyi [#]rgyud kyi rjes su 'brangs nas rdo rje sems dpa' rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]rgyu dang rkyen khyod la khong du chud par bya'o/_/bden par na sems ni dbyibs dang kha dog dang bral ba snang ba tsam nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i ngo bo nyid don dam pa'i bden pa dang 'dra bar reg par dka' ba'o/_/de lta mod kyi snang ba tsam gyi snang ba gsum po rlung la brten par gyur
[\[85a.2\]]pa dang /_thun mong du gyur pas yang ba [#]ste/_de bas na rlung gis [#]rnam par shes pa bcings pa yin no/_/de nas shes rab dang thabs kyi snang ba gnyis 'od zer lnga dang bcas shing sna tshogs pa'i yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa'i sgyu ma lta bu'i lha'i sku 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'di'i bzhon pa gang yin
[\[85a.3\]]zhe na/_rlung zhes bya ba ste sems rdo rje gang yin pa de lta bu'i rlung la zhon nas/_gang du 'dod pa der 'pho bar 'gyur ro/_/rnam par shes pa 'pho ba'i mdo las kyang gsal bar gsungs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sman chen ngas tshigs su bcad pa phyed kyi don gyi phyir brag gi
[\[85a.4\]]rtse mo nas lus bor te dka' ba rnam pa brgya stong du ma [#]nyams su myong ngo /_/sman chen khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang /_ngas khyod la lan gdab bo/_de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa
[\[85a.5\]]'di'i rang bzhin ci lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sman chen sgyu ma mkhan gyi mi'i rang bzhin gang yin pa dang /_mi'i grib ma chu'i nang du 'byung ba gsal ba ma yin zhing mi gsal ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa dang /_mig dang nam mkha'i rang bzhin gang yin pa
[\[85a.6\]]dang /[# ]srid pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de bzhin no/_/gang yang sman chen khyod kyis skye ba med pa nyid kyis ji ltar thog mar 'chi bas byas pa'i gzugs blta bar bya zhes bya ba bshad par bya'o/_/'di lta ste/_chu'i nang du byung ba'i skyes bu'i grib ma'i gzugs bzhin du blta bar bya'i [#]de'i nang
[\[85a.7\]]du byung ba'i snang ba bzhin du ni [#]blta bar mi bya'o/_/yang sman chen de'i mgo bo dang lag pa dang rkang pa dang ldan par gyur pa yang chu'i nang du byung ba'i skyes bu nyid bzhin no/_/de la ni grang ba'am dro ba'am lus dub pa la sogs pa med de/_de la sha dang nya sha la sogs pa mi srid pa'i phyir dang /_
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]grib ma ni khams kyis rnam par gzhig mi nus pa'i phyir ro/_/de na chu'i nang du byung ba'i skyes bu'i gzugs brnyan ni bde ba'i sgra'am sdug bsngal ba'i sgra brjod par mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du rnam par shes pa 'di yang thog mar 'chi ba'i lus kyi rang bzhin yongs su spangs nas des byas
[\[85b.2\]]pa'i gzugs su gyur pa'o/_/de ltar byis pa so so'i skye bo srid pa bar ma pa zhes bya ba'i 'khor ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro/_/de nyid bla ma brgyud pa'i rim gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi man ngag thob pa rnams ni bdag la byin gyis brlab [#]pa zhes bya ba 'di ltar rtsig pa'i ras ris me long gi
[\[85b.3\]]nang du nye bar snang ba de bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa'i [#]sku'i ngo bo nyid kyis bdag nyid sprul te/_rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa sku blta bas chog mi shes pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis la sogs pas lus la brgyan pa ste/_mdor na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan gyis
[\[85b.4\]]brgyan pa zhes pa'i bar du'o/_/ji skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyud las/_'ja' tshon lta bu'i lus dag ni/_/de nyid bsgoms pas thob par 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/'di'i don ni 'di yin te/_'ja' tshon zhes bya ba ni lha'i dbang po'i
[\[85b.5\]]gzhu ste/_de yang gang zhe na/_dngos su 'od zer lngas nye bar mtshon pa ste/_ji ltar 'ja' tshon nam mkha'i dkyil na kha dog lnga'i dbye ba yongs su gsal ba yin te/_lus kyang de dang [#]'dra bar nye bar mtshon pa'i phyir/_'ja' tshon lta bu'i lus dag ni/_/zhes bya ba'i [#]don to/_/de
[\[85b.6\]]nyid bsgoms pas thob par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba ni bla ma las man ngag yang dag par thob nas de kho na nyid bsgom zhing don dam pa'i bden pa la dmigs pas 'thob pa'i don to/_/rdo rje slob mas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das som nyir gyur pa gzhan 'ga' zhig bdag la mchis te/_
[\[85b.7\]]ci'i phyir yun ring por gnyid log nas ci'i phyir lus kyi khog pa bor te/_rmi lam du sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i gnas sam/_yul phyogs gzhan dag tu song nas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga nyams su myong ste/_yang yul 'dir 'ongs nas ci'i phyir rmi lam na dge ba dang mi dge ba
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]mthong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur/_de bzhin du gnyid log pa'am/_gnyid ma log pa'i gnas skabs dag ci tha dad par mchis sam/_'on te ma mchis/_rdo rje slob dpon gyis smras pa/_sems can chen
[\[86a.2\]]po legs so legs so/_/thog ma med pa'i rang bzhin can gyi lus la dngos por bltas nas 'dzin pa rnams kyi [#]the tshom bsal ba'i phyir dang /_bdag la byin gyis brlab par bshad pa rnam par gsal bar bya ba'i phyir rmi lam gyi mtshan nyid yongs su 'dri bar byed pa
[\[86a.3\]]legs so legs so/_/de bas na rmi lam gyi sgo nas gzugs brnyan du bshad pa'i lha'i sku thams cad kyi so so rang rig par gyur pa rgyud dang mdo sde rnams kyi rjes su 'brangs nas rab tu rtogs par bya yis rtse gcig pa'i sems kyis nyon cig_/phung po khams dang skye mched
[\[86a.4\]]dbang sogs la/_/shes pa gnyis po de 'dir rab 'dus nas/_/stong chen gyur pa gang zhig gnyid log pa/_/rlung gi shugs kyis rmi lam mthong bar 'gyur/_/rmi lam sad la bye brag gzhan med par/_/kun du rtog pas rmi lam 'bras 'dod pas/_/'gro ba nyin mtshan
[\[86a.5\]]nye bar gnyid log cing /_/sa mthug gyur pas rab [#]tu ring gnyid log_/'bras bu ma smin byas pa'i las rnams kyis/_/skye 'dir rlung ni slar yang 'jug par 'gyur/_/'bras bu smin par gyur na rlung 'di nyid/_/'jig rten 'chi ba gzhan du myur 'gror 'gyur/_/ji ltar
[\[86a.6\]]phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i rgyal dbang po/_/de yi sku la rkang rus sha med kyang /_/sems can phan phyir khams la 'jug mdzad cing /_/sprul pa'i sku yis bya ba mdzad pa yin/_/rim pa de bzhin gnyid log sad pa'i sems/_'bras bu 'dod pa'i rnam rtog dra ba can/_/de
[\[86a.7\]]bas chos kun rmi lam lta bu ste/_/bden dang brdzun pa dag kyang yod ma yin/_/zhes bya'o/_/don 'di nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i mdo las kyang /_dge slong 'di ji snyam du sems/_ci khyod kyis gnyid log pa'i rmi lam na kun du rtog
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]pa'i tshe 'dod chags spyod pa myong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das myong lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong sems kyis 'dod chags spyad par khyod kyis mi shes sam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni de lta bu lags so/_/bcom
[\[86b.2\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong ci khyod kyis rmi lam gyi sems dang /_gnyid ma log pa'i sems 'di la bye brag dang tha dad du bya ba zhig yod par mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni rmi lam gyi sems dang gnyid ma log pa'i sems
[\[86b.3\]]la [#]tha dad du bgyi ba cung zad kyang ma mthong lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong 'di ji snyam du sems/_chos thams cad ni rmi lam lta bu'o zhes ngas ma bstan tam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni de ltar lags so zhes gsol pa dang /_
[\[86b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las kyang /_kye bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'di lta ste/_dper na byang chub kyi sems ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes 'byung
[\[86b.5\]]bar byed pa rdo rje'i gnas lta bu ste/_byang chub kyi sems de yang lus la mi gnas/_ngag la mi gnas/_sems la mi gnas so/_/chos gang khams gsum na mi gnas pa de la skye ba yang med de/_'di ni ye shes 'byung ba'i rdo rje'i gnas de yin no/_/kye bcom ldan
[\[86b.6\]]'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rmi lam 'di ni bdag gis khams gsum du rmi lam mthong bar bya'o snyam du mi sems so/_/mi yang bdag gis rmi lam mthong ngo snyam du mi sems te/_khams gsum gyi bya ba de rnams kyang [#]rmi lam lta bu rmi lam dang 'dra ba rmi lam las
[\[86b.7\]]byung ba'o/_/de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed pa rnams dang /_sems can ji snyed pa thams cad kyang rmi lam ltar bdag med pa'i gnas su rig par bya'o zhes
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]gsungs pa dang /_sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las kyang /_sems dang sems las byung ba'i rnal 'byor chen po ni bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de
[\[87a.2\]]ni sgyu ma'i dpes nye bar mtshon pa ste/_de bas na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni sgyu ma lta bu dang /_chu zla lta bu dang /_mig yor lta bu dang /_smig rgyu lta bu dang /_rmi lam lta bu [#]dang /_brag ca dang /_dri za'i grong khyer dang /_
[\[87a.3\]]mig 'phrul dang /_'ja' tshon dang /_glog dang /_chu'i chu bur dang /_me long gi gzugs brnyan te/_sgyu ma'i dpe bcu gnyis kyis bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin nye bar mtshon par 'gyur ba yin te/_de ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs
[\[87a.4\]]pa thams cad 'khor ba ji srid pa'i bar du sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bzhugs nas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyis rol par mdzad cing dga' bar mdzad pas yongs su spyod par mdzad la/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan dang ldan pas bdag nyid bzhed pa tsam gyis sangs
[\[87a.5\]]rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gshegs par mdzad do/_/de ltar dus gsum gyi 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rjes su dran nas rnam par grol bar 'dod pas rdo rje slob dpon 'bad pas mnyes par byas la bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'i man ngag thob nas/_de rnam
[\[87a.6\]]par dag pa'i thabs btsal bar bya'o/_/kun rdzob kyi bden pa bsdus pa'i the tshom gcod pa ste le'u drug pa'o//_//rdo rje slob mas gsol pa/_kun rdzob kyi bden pa la ni som nyi ma mchis na/_da ni snang ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas don dam pa'i bden pa'i cha bla ma'i zhal
[\[87a.7\]]snga nas kyi bka' drin gyis ches shes par 'tshal lo/_/rdo rje slob dpon gyis smras pa/_kun rdzob kyi bden pa zhes bya ba ni bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim gyis rdo rje sems dpa'i skur rdzogs pa ni sgyu ma'i dpe bcu gnyis kyis rab tu bstan par nus kyi don dam pa'i bden
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]pa ni yang lus med pa/_dpe med pa/_rtsom pa thams cad dang bral ba so so rang gis rig pa ste/_de bas na bla ma'i kha las bstan pa med par shes par mi 'gyur ro/_/ji skad du gsungs pa'i tshig las kyang /_ji ltar mar me bum nang gnas/_/phyi rol du ni snang mi
[\[87b.2\]]'gyur/_/bum pa de nyid bcag gyur na/_/de 'og mar me 'od snang 'gyur/_/de bzhin bum pa rang lus nyid/_/de nyid mar me lta bu nyid/_/bla ma'i kha yis legs bcag na/_/sangs rgyas ye shes gsal bar 'gyur/_/nam mkha' las ni nam mkha' 'byung /_/mkha'
[\[87b.3\]]yis nam mkha' mthong 'gyur ba'i/_/de nyid bla ma'i kha nyid las/_/sbyor ba legs par ston pa yin/_/zhes gsungs te/_rigs pa 'dis na sgra'i rnam pa las byung ba yin pas thog ma dang tha ma med cing /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dang bral ba ni
[\[87b.4\]]kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i mtshan nyid kyi sgra gang yin pa'i sgo nas rab tu bstan pa'o/_/don dam pa'i bden pa de yang ma bcos pa'i nam mkha' dang mnyam pa dri ma med pa'i ngo bo nyid de don 'di nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir tshul gcig par bstan pa'i mdo las/_chos 'di sgra skad
[\[87b.5\]]dag gis lung bstan te/_/chos dang sgra dag 'dir ni rnyed mi 'gyur/_/chos nyid tshul gcig dngos la'ang 'jug byed pa/_/bzod mchog bla na med la reg [#]par 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de ltar rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis su med par [#]khong du chud pa'i slob mas bla mas [ #]
[\[87b.6\]]bstan pa'i lung thob nas rgyud las ji skad bshad pa'i cho ga dang /_'byor pa ci yod pas tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor byas la nam phyed na legs par bslabs [#]pa'i phyag rgya lus dri zhim pos byugs shing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bla ma la phul te/_gsang ba dang de las gzhan
[\[87b.7\]]pa'i mchod pas yang dag par mchod la bla ma'i mdun du pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_thal mo sbyar ba byas la 'khor ba las skyob pa'i yid kyis slob dpon la de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum bzhin du lhag par mos pa dang /_bstod pa'i mchod pa 'dis

[\[88a.1\]]mngon par byang chub par gsol ba gdab par bya'o/_/mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud/_/yang dag mtha' gyur khyod la 'dud/_/stong nyid las byung khyod la 'dud/_/sangs rgyas byang chub phyag 'tshal 'dud/_/mngon par byang chub mthong ba ni/_/slob dpon
[\[88a.2\]]chen po bdag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes che/_/thams cad stong pa bla na med/_/rang myong mtshan nyid gcig pa nyid/_/sems dpa' chen po stsal du gsol/_/las dang skye las rnam grol pa'i/_/tshe 'dir byang chub nyid 'thob pa/_/khyed zhabs pad+ma
[\[88a.3\]]spangs nas ni/_/gtso bo gzhan du skyabs ma mchis/_/'gro ba'i dpa' bo thub chen po/_/de bas sangs rgyas mchog mnyes mdzod/_/de ltar gsol ba'i cho ga mchog_/dam pa de ni thos gyur nas/_/bla ma dpal ldan yon tan mtsho/_/snying rjes slob ma la skyed la/_/_

[\[88a.5\]]ma de bos te/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs la/_/rgyal ba'i phyag rgyar bcas pa yis/_/dam tshig dag ni bstan par bya/_/rdo rje can ni gnyis pa yis/_/dbang bskur ba ni sbyin par bya/_/bkra shis sgra ni bsgrags pa dang /_/rol mo'i sgra skad sna tshogs kyis/_/khams
[\[88a.6\]]gsum pa yi dbang bskur bas/_/slob ma 'dud cing thal sbyar ba/_/der ni rab tu bskul ba yis/_/rjes su gnang ba de nas sbyin/_/phreng ba chu dang rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/rdo rje dril bu me long dang /_/ming dang slob dpon rjes gnang ste/_/dbang bskur rim pa 'di yin no/_/de nas
[\[88a.7\]]byang chub mtshan nyid ni/_/bla ma brgyud rim las 'ongs pa/_/man ngag gi ni gzhi thob pa/_/de nas de la sbyin par bya/_/de la mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa ni rnam pa gnyis te/_/'di lta ste phyi dang nang gi'o/_/de la dang por phyi'i bstan par bya ste/_/tho rangs kyi thun mtshams su

[\[88b.1\]]ma rig pa'i snang ba 'das nas ji srid nyi ma gsal bar ma gyur pa ste/_'di la ni 'od gsal ba dri ma med pa'i rnam pa gsal zhing lus dang ngag dang yid dang bral ba thams cad stong pa'i mtshan nyid can no/_/nyi ma shar ba ni snang ba mched pa'o/_/nyi ma nub pa'i thun mtshams su ma

[\[88b.3\]]tshogs dang ldan par mthong ngo /_/gnyis pa ni snang ba ste/_zla ba'i 'od zer lta bu'o/_/gsum pa ni snang ba mched pa ste nyi ma'i 'od zer lta bu'o/_/bzhi pa ni snang ba thob pa ste mun pa lta bu'o/_/de nas mun pa dang bral ba'i skad cig la 'od gsal ba ste/_shin tu gsal ba rtag tu
[\[88b.4\]]snang ba'i mtshan nyid can don dam pa'i bden pa'i rang gi mtshan nyid ye shes kyi mig gis mthong ngo /_/de ltar thams cad stong pa nyid mngon sum du byas nas rim pa 'dis bsam gtan rnam pa nyid [#]la dmigs par byed do/_/de'i rim pa ni 'di yin te/_chu bo'am lteng ka'i chu ni dri med
[\[88b.5\]]dag la gor bu gnas pa ltar/_/de bzhin de la rim gyis rjes su gzhig par byed pas rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu bsam/_/me long la ni rlung dag rim gyis zad par byed pa bzhin du'ang blta bya ste/_/ril por 'dzin la'ang bya ba'i rim pa 'dir ni de bzhin yang dag brtag_/da ni

[\[89a.1\]]yi ge med pa dang /_tshig med pa dang /_dmigs su med pa dang /_bla na med pa dang /_brjod du med pa dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_mtha' yas pa dang /_grangs med pa dang /_dbang po las 'das pa dang /_gnas med pa dang /_mtshan nyid med pa

[\[219b.1\]]pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa byung nas slob ma'i lce [#]la dbang bskur bar bya'o/_/'o na des bag chags sam dri ma gang 'khru bar byed na/_ngag gi rtog dang dri mar bcas/_/sbyong bar byed pa nus pa'o/_/zhes pa tshig 'khyal pa la sogs pa'i dri ma thams cad gang gis 'khru bar

[\[262b.1\]]rdo rings dang /_shing ljon pa dang /_khron pa dang /_chu mig la sogs pa sku'i bdag nyid du bya ba'i gzhi'o/_/bgrang phreng dang /_'jig rten pa'i bstan bcos dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i glegs bam la sogs pa ni gsung gi bdag nyid du bya ba'i gzhi'o/_/rdo rje dang 'khor lo la sogs pa lha'i mtshan ma thams cad ni
